title: Hey RIOT! Macs still have crippling performance issues when playing with sound, could you address?
body: This shit has been happening for 2 patches now and im sick of playing at a handicap!

replies.body:
Hey MrBionic,

The team is aware of the issue, and they're actively working to get a fix in ASAP.
its been ASAP for nearly 2 weeks now.

Hey KateyKhaos,
It has been since the deployment of Patch 6.6, nearly two sufferable weeks. 
I have played on my 2008 MacBook Pro since Season 3.
Thousands and thousands of matches. 
Myself and others concluded that our machines had reached their inevitable fate. 

That scare is awful,
